title: Albertsons Launches Strategic Review
sub_head: The parent company of grocery chains Safeway and Jewel-Osco went public in 2020
body:
Supermarket chain Albertsons Cos. said Monday its board has commenced a strategic review to enhance its growth and maximize shareholder value.
“The review will include an assessment of various balance sheet optimization and capital return strategies, potential strategic or financial transactions and development of other strategic initiatives to complement Albertsons’ existing businesses, as well as responding to inquiries,” the company said in a prepared remarks.
